comments:
I, i'm affraid i have some troubles when i close my RCP project. Everything was 
working fine and the minute after, it wasn't the same whereas i didn't make any 
changes. The problem occurs when i try to close my RCP application (with exit 
button and also with the cross). It says : an error occurs when closing the 
workbench. Here is the log file :

I found the problem ...
Soory for the troubles ... here is the reason :
I didn't instanciate a class in my project so it value was 'null'. When i 
closed my application i suppose the garbage collector didn't know what to do ?
Have a good day.
